trans-unit.resname: GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zamriel, Seraph of Steel
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying As long as it's your turn, equipped creatures you control have indestructible.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·1 | Zamriel, Seraph of Steel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Armored in courage and armed with searing light, her legion stands unflinching against the forces of darkness.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·2 | Maeve, Insidious Singer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Maeve, Insidious Singer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: GN3·2 | Maeve, Insidious Singer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Goad target creature. Whenever that creature attacks one of your opponents this turn, you draw a card. (A goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able, until your next turn.)

trans-unit.resname: GN3·2 | Maeve, Insidious Singer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her haunting tune drowns out the percussion of snapping masts.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Menace Whenever another creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant. When Vogar dies, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·3 | Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A despot in life. A monster in death.
Nogi, Draco-Zealot
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever Nogi, Draco-Zealot attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.
"Glory to the Burning Ones! May their mighty fangs devour all foes!"

trans-unit.resname: GN3·5 | Imaryll, Elfhame Elite | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Imaryll, Elfhame Elite attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of other Elves you control. You may have Imaryll assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

trans-unit.resname: GN3·5 | Imaryll, Elfhame Elite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The elvish kingdoms of Llanowar are united in their distrust of outsiders.
